abstract: Pres Obama is expected to use his final State of the Union address to address public directly and frame narrative surrounding his legacy and debate over future of country and who should replace him; Obama hopes to counter Republican criticisms and generate support for several key initiatives.

headline.print_headline: Obama Seeks to Define His Legacy and ’16 Race in Last State of the Union
headline.main: In Final State of the Union Address, Obama Aims to Set Tone for ’16 Campaign

snippet: Mr. Obama hopes to use his last address as president to frame the debate about who should replace him and where the country should go from here.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Obama hopes to use his last address as president to frame the debate about who should replace him and where the country should go from here.
